entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Iqaluit
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:08 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -33.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Iqaluit Airport 09:36 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -33.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.6 kPa rising
Visibility: 48.3 km
Humidity: 68 %
Wind Chill: -46
Dewpoint: -37.0°C
Wind: NW 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. Temperature steady near minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Blowing snow at times early this morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light near noon. Temperature steady near minus 34. Wind chill minus 53 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. 60 percent chance of light snow overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 28 by morning. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Wednesday 25 January 2023
